verbs.description: As [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: weighs] [ARG1: whether to pull America out of Iran 's nuclear deal with world powers] , so too hangs billions of dollars ' worth of international business deals .

As [ARG0: President Donald Trump] weighs whether to [V: pull] [ARG1: America] [ARG2: out of Iran 's nuclear deal with world powers] , so too hangs billions of dollars ' worth of international business deals .
